00002  *      tt.degrade~

00004  *      Make audio sound really bad

00011 
00012 #include "TTMaxObject.h"        // TTBlue extended API for writing Max objects
00013 #include "TTDegrade.h"          // TTBlue class that we are going to wrap
00014 
00015 
00016 // Data Structure for this object
00017 typedef struct _degrade {
00018         TTMaxObject             kjerne;
00019         TTDegrade               *degrade;
00020         long                    attrBitdepth;
00021         float                   attrSrRatio;
00022 } t_degrade;
00023 
00024 
00025 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type
00026 void*           degrade_new(t_symbol *msg, short argc, t_atom *argv);                                   // New Object Creation Method
00027 void            degrade_free(t_degrade *x);
00028 void            degrade_assist(t_degrade *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);   // Assistance Method
00029 t_int*          degrade_perform(t_int *w);                                                                                              // An MSP Perform (signal) Method
00030 void            degrade_dsp(t_degrade *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);                                 // DSP Method
00031 t_max_err       degrade_setBitdepth(t_degrade *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00032 t_max_err       degrade_setSrRatio(t_degrade *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00033 
00034 // Globals
00035 t_class *degrade_class;                         // Required. Global pointing to this class
00036 
00037 
00038 /************************************************************************************/
00039 // Main() Function
00040 
00041 int main(void)
00042 {
00043         t_class *c = class_new("tt.degrade~",
00044                                 (method)degrade_new,
00045                                 (method)degrade_free,
00046                                 sizeof(t_degrade), 
00047                                 (method)0L, 
00048                                 A_GIMME, 0);
00049 
00050         ttMaxObjectInit(c);
00051 
00052         // Add any messages here -- this object doesn't really have any to add
00053         class_addmethod(c, (method)degrade_assist,      "assist",       A_CANT, 0L); 
00054 
00055         // Add any attributes here...
00056         class_addattr(c, attr_offset_new("bitdepth", _sym_long, 0,
00057                 (method)0L, (method)degrade_setBitdepth, calcoffset(t_degrade, attrBitdepth)));
00058 
00059         class_addattr(c, attr_offset_new("srRatio", _sym_float, 0,
00060                 (method)0L, (method)degrade_setSrRatio, calcoffset(t_degrade, attrSrRatio)));
00061 
00062         class_dspinit(c);
00063         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00064         degrade_class = c;
00065         return 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 /************************************************************************************/
00070 // Object Creation Method
00071 
00072 void* degrade_new(t_symbol *msg, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00073 {
00074     t_degrade *x = (t_degrade *)object_alloc(degrade_class);
00075     if(x){
00076                 ttMaxObjectCreate((TTMaxObject *) x, msg, argc, argv, degrade_perform);         
00077                 x->degrade = new TTDegrade(x->kjerne.maxNumChannels);
00078                 ttMaxObjectAdd((TTMaxObject *) x, (TTAudioObject*)x->degrade);
00079         }
00080         return x;
00081 }
00082 
00083 // Memory Deallocation
00084 void degrade_free(t_degrade *x)
00085 {
00086         ttMaxObjectFree((TTMaxObject*) x);
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 /************************************************************************************/
00091 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00092 
00093 // Method for Assistance Messages
00094 void degrade_assist(t_degrade *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00095 {
00096         if(msg==1)      // Inlets
00097                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) input, control messages");                
00098         else if(msg==2) // Outlets
00099                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) Filtered output");
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 // Perform (signal) Method
00104 t_int *degrade_perform(t_int *w)
00105 {
00106         t_degrade       *x = (t_degrade *)(w[1]);
00107         short           i, j;
00108         
00109         for(i=0; i < x->kjerne.audioIn->numChannels; i++){
00110                 j = (i*2) + 1;
00111                 x->kjerne.audioIn->setVector(i, (t_float *)(w[j+1]));
00112                 x->kjerne.audioOut->setVector(i, (t_float *)(w[j+2]));
00113         }
00114 
00115         if(!x->kjerne.obj.z_disabled)                                                   // if we are not muted...
00116                 x->degrade->process(*x->kjerne.audioIn, *x->kjerne.audioOut);           // Actual DC-Blocker process
00117 
00118         return w + ((x->kjerne.audioIn->numChannels*2)+2);                              // +2 = +1 for the x pointer and +1 to point to the next object
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 t_max_err degrade_setBitdepth(t_degrade *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00123 {
00124         if(argc){
00125                 x->attrBitdepth = atom_getlong(argv);
00126                 x->degrade->setParameterValue(TT("bitdepth"), x->attrBitdepth);
00127         }
00128         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 t_max_err degrade_setSrRatio(t_degrade *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00133 {
00134         if(argc){
00135                 x->attrSrRatio = atom_getfloat(argv);
00136                 x->degrade->setParameterValue(TT("srRatio"), x->attrSrRatio);
00137         }
00138         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00139 }
